title: The Yankees Booger Up Their Uniforms With Patches From Starr Insurance
content:
Speaking of my telling the Yankees what to do, they only way these gross arm patches are acceptable is if they put every dollar from the sponsorship — a reported $25 million per year — toward signing Shohei Ohtani, who, despite the patch, is going to look sharp in pinstripes.

 ★
author: John Gruber
